sub_title: System Test Engineer at Allegion, PLC
summary:
I am a highly determined and adaptive professional with 4 years of experience in Testing across Firmware, Application software, and Product Testing. Throughout my career, I have acquired the following skills:
☛ Hands-on experience in system testing life-cycle which includes design, develop and implement test plans, test cases and test processes 
☛ ISTQB certified software tester
☛ Familiar with firmware and protocol testing on Electronic locks through RSSimulator, RSI Test tool, Apache server and SUS 
☛ Well versed with defect tracking tools like Seapine Test Track Pro and Visual Studio Enterprise
☛ Good exposure in working with Multimeters and Variable power supplies 
☛ Proficient in all phases of Test Case management tools such as Seapine Test Case Manager and Visual studio
☛ Team player and self-starter with excellent communication, coordination, documentation, project planning and interpersonal skills

TECHNICAL SKILLS:
Programming Languages:	Java, C# and C
Tools & Utilities:	Selenium, Appium, Eclipse, Seapine Test Track Pro, Test Case Manager, Seapine Surround SCM, Visual Studio 2015
Application Packages:	MS office Suite
Operating Systems:	Windows 98/ 2000/ XP
